columns.name: lost_to_followup_reason
columns.formula:
reason = ["Completed study",
"Discharged to palliative care",
"Lost contact",
"Not applicable",
"Unknown",
"Withdrew from study"][random(0,5)]

if lost_to_followup == true
then reason
else "" end

columns.name: disease_status_at_followup
columns.formula:
["Complete remission",
"Distant progression",
"Loco-regional progression",
"No evidence of disease",
"Partial remission",
"Progression NOS",
"Relapse or recurrence",
"Stable"][random(0,7)]

columns.name: relapse_type
columns.formula:
["Distant recurrence/metastasis",
"Local recurrence",
"Local recurrence and distant metastasis",
"Progression (liquid tumours)",
"Biochemical progression"][random(0,4)]

columns.name: method_of_progression_status
columns.formula:
["Imaging (procedure)",
"Histopathology test (procedure)",
"Assessment of symptom control (procedure)",
"Physical examination procedure (procedure)",
"Tumor marker measurement (procedure)", 
"Laboratory data interpretation (procedure)"][random(0,5)]

columns.name: recurrence_tumour_staging_system
columns.formula:
["AJCC 8th edition",
"AJCC 7th edition",
"AJCC 6th edition",
"Ann Arbor staging system",
"Binet staging system",
"Durie-Salmon staging system",
"FIGO staging system",
"Lugano staging system",
"Rai staging system",
"Revised International staging system (RISS)",
"SEER staging system",
"St Jude staging system"][random(0,11)]

columns.formula:

"Stage 0",
"Stage 0a",
"Stage 0is",
"Stage 1",
"Stage 1B",
"Stage A",
"Stage B",

"Stage I",

"Stage IAB",
"Stage IAE",
"Stage IAES",
"Stage IAS",
"Stage IB",
"Stage IB1",
"Stage IB2",
"Stage IBE",
"Stage IBES",
"Stage IBS",
"Stage IC",
"Stage IE",
"Stage IEA",
"Stage IEB",

"Stage II",
"Stage IIIC",

"Stage IIIC2",
"Stage IIID",
"Stage IIIE",
"Stage IIIES",
"Stage IIIS",
"Stage II bulky"][random(0,37)]
